game.name: Santa Racer
game.description:
Christmas lovers always seek for something really exciting and engaging gaming content to keep them occupied during the evening of the festival. However, today we have come up with a latest Christmas challenge that cannot keep you entertained on the eve of festival, but it will help you to cherish the beautiful moments of your favorite day whenever you want. So, why waste your time anymore, join Santa Racer right away to enjoy the spirit of Christmas on your own convenience.

In this cool HTML5 car game, you have to control a car on a tricky road that includes lots of sharp turns and tricky hurdles. Choose any option between 1 player or 2 players and get ready to enter the real racing fun! Play alone or compete with other players from all across the world to see who is better in driving! Make sure to complete the race first while competing against the other players or CPU to prove yourself as the best driver.

It is not going to be as easy as you thought of since being a player you would have a lot of holiday traffic to deal with. Guide your favorite character Santa to race across the difficult tracks! Dodge the obstacles by moving left or right or jumping over them to avoid the collisions in this cool Christmas driving simulator! Grab as many bonus items as you can to boost your score in each level! The left top portion will show your progress report and the top middle portion will show you the clock. Good luck to have a blast in this latest Christmas game!
